# The gettext extension

Configure the `gettext` extension.

This extension provides support for GNU gettext using NLS (Native Language
Support) API.

## PHP_EXT_GETTEXT

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_GETTEXT_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
